title: Weight loss drug users report shocking hair loss | 7NEWS
description: Weight loss injectables like Ozempic and Mounjaro are causing unexpected hair loss in users who experience significant weight loss of 10-20 per cent of their body weight, typically around the three to six month mark. Melissa Ambrogio lost 10kg but also experienced significant hair loss, a side effect now affecting increasing numbers of patients. Medical experts report hair loss clinics are seeing five to six patients per day with this issue, compared to one to two per month a year ago, though doctors say the hair loss is usually temporary. title: Disastrous start to 2026 on Sydney beaches; New Year's Eve at Sydney Harbour | 7NEWS Sydney
description: It's been a disastrous start to 2026 on our beaches. Hours into the New Year, a woman drowned at Maroubra, before a young man went missing in pounding swell at Coogee. This afternoon, a woman couldn't be saved after being pulled from the water on the Mid North Coast. It's prompted a passionate plea tonight from our lifesavers to all beachgoers.   It's been a quieter New Year's Eve at Sydney's big night on the Harbour, with crowds slightly down and more room to move. title: Witnesses describe the deadly inferno at Swiss ski resort bar | 7NEWS
description: A devastating fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort during New Year's Eve celebrations killed around 40 people and injured 115 others. Eyewitnesses describe a massive explosion, chaotic rescue efforts, and narrow escapes. Survivors recount helping pull injured victims from the burning building and the tragic circumstances that determined who was inside the Constellation bar when the fire broke out. title: Usman Khawaja announces retirement from international cricket
description: Usman Khawaja has announced he will retire from international cricket after the Sydney Ashes Test, 15 years and a day since he debuted for Australia against England at the same ground. The 39-year-old thanked his parents for helping him realise his dream of donning the baggy green. #usmankhawaja #ashes #ausveng #cricket #scg

title: SCG curator Adam Lewis confident his team can produce quality pitch for final Ashes Test
description: SCG curator Adam Lewis is under pressure to produce a quality pitch after last week's disastrous two-day Ashes Test in Melbourne. The ICC gave the MCG's deck an "unsatisfactory" rating but Lewis is confident his team can produce one befitting the occasion in Sydney. Watch every ball of the Test from Sunday morning, live and free on Channel 7 and 7plus. #cricket #ashes #ausveng #scg #sydney

title: Usman Khawaja announces retirement after final Ashes test | 7NEWS
description: Australian cricket star Usman Khawaja has announced his retirement from all forms of international cricket after the fifth Ashes test at the SCG. The 39-year-old, who made his test debut at the same ground in 2011, revealed his decision at an emotional press conference attended by his family and teammates. Khawaja retires with 16 test centuries, over 6,000 test runs across 88 tests, and is remembered as one of the most stylish batsmen in modern cricket and a proud role model for immigrants in Australian sport. title: Horse rider takes trusty steed into Macca's drive-thru in Googong, NSW
description: You can lead a horse to water but you can't make it drink, but can you lead a horse to Macca's and make a drive-thru order? Keen to find out, Erin Beattie took her trusty steed, Waylon J Bronson, through the drive-thru in Googong, NSW and successfully ordered a vanilla soft serve cone. #horse #horseriding #mcdonalds #drivethru #australia
